KIGALI-Hotel-and-Travel.name: Rwanda Eco Company and Safaris
KIGALI-Hotel-and-Travel.about: Rwanda Eco Company and Safaris, is a domestic local safari company, operating various tailor-made safari across East Africa, and based in Kigali – Rwanda. With over 15 years of professionalism, efficient safari guides and our well maintained and customized 4x4 safari vehicles, we are committed to exceed the client’s expectations. Our Safaris! We specialize in private, tailor-made authentic safaris of a life time across Rwanda, and the entire East Africa. However, we have variety of already designed itineraries that we can recommend based on our client’s satisfaction. From your first point of contact with Rwanda Eco Company and Safaris, till the last date of your tour, you will be confident that you’re in safe professional hands. Let's tour!
